desc: Its faintly glowing bulbs are found in ponds by ley-lines.
It glows in dark forests at night, clinging to roots and tree trunks.

name: vika root
desc: Its roots drive so deep that none have found their source.
flavor: Druids claim all vika root are a single great plant, rooted at the world's center.

name: blood grass
desc: Blood drawn from its sharp blades are all the sustenance it requires.
A bright and cheerful spring bloom.

flavor: Noone actually knows what lavender does.

desc: Such a delicate bloom for such a deadly poison.

name: dragon scales
flavor: The plucker might not still be living.
